item.title: About
item.description: Oh, hey there! I am Chi Jun. You can call me Jun or June as well. I spend most of my time playing video games and when I’m not, you will probably find me napping somewhere else. In the rare occassion that I’m doing neither of those activites, I would spend my time on piano practicing, book reading, or screwing around with some side projects (like updating this site). Feel free to reach out to me at pcjun97@gmail.
